review: Fun game for casual play with friends. Ranked is a bit frustrating but so are most competitive team shooters. Map and skin art is the best in the industry. Super unique ways to play in every role.

Ğ˜ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑƒÑ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ²Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½ÑƒÑ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ½ÑƒÑ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ñƒ Ñ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ» Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ´Ğ° Ñ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ·ÑŒÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´ÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ ÑˆÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ²Ğ°Ğ».

As someone who played this game since it's launch back in 2016, it's disheartening to see how far this game has fallen, it's a shell of it's former with developers who clearly don't care about their playerbase anymore. All the while nickel and diming us for 20$ skins and a battlepass you have to buy with real money each season. And an ambitious PvE mode to which it's original vision was canceled because it wouldn't be profitable. I advise anyone looking into this game to steer clear at all costs, these developers and this publisher couldn't care less about you, You're nothing less than dollar signs to these people.

I download this game just to get an achievement and write a review.
Don't waste your time on this game.

Surely they won't double back on all of their promises that would make the game an actual sequel and instead lock all of the content that was initially free for OW1 owners behind a paywall and have no form of compensation for those who purchased the original game, right guys?
17% positive reviews? it should be much lower than that :)
Pls give paid for steam DLC in game....

Blizzard lied about OW2, simple as.

This game will never hold a candle to the original Overwatch. Overwatch's reputation died so Overwatch 2 could suck wallets dry. There is no soul to be found in this game. Any fond memories surrounding Overwatch are dead and in the past now. Never forget that they cut a bunch of promised content as well and hoped nobody would care. I could say more but I'd be here all day. Disappointment fills the hole that the original game that I loved so much left behind.
